title: Summer in the Swiss Alps at a Stylish New Hotel
description: Soak up the pure air and awe-inspiring beauty of the Swiss Alps with a sun-kissed summer escape to the grand opening of Valsana Hotel & Appartements Arosa. Spectacularly located amongst clear lakes, forest and mountains in the Alpine resort village of Arosa, this exceptionally stylish and eco-conscious hotel is the perfect base from which to walk, bike and explore amongst one of natureâ€™s spectacular playgrounds.
